title: Want to Sell More Books on Amazon KDP? | Publisher Rocket | Deep Dive Publishers

tactics.name: Category Optimization
tactics.description: Selecting accurate and high-performing categories to improve visibility and sales potential
steps: Use Publisher Rocket's category search tool
Search for keywords related to the book's niche
Analyze BSR and sales thresholds for top rankings
caveats: Incorrect categories risk draft mode rejection
source_quotes: your book categories determine where your book is being sold

heuristics.name: Review-Driven Boost
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize categories with search volume
source_quotes: if you're trying to sell more books you want to find categories where people are actually searching

heuristics.name: Review Threshold Boost
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize categories for boosting
source_quotes: you only need to sell six books in a single hour to hit number one

claims.statement: Amazon KDP limits books to three categories, impacting visibility and sales potential
source_quotes: you can only have three categories

claims.statement: Publisher Rocket helps identify categories for KDP books to achieve bestseller status

niche_patterns.example: Etsy sellers + marketing challenges + low competition
niche_patterns.description: Target underserved niches with specific pain points
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Balances search volume with manageable competition
source_quotes: find categories where people are actually searching
